## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards (Clean Code, SOLID, KISS)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary (explaining "why", not "what")
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed

### Cross-Platform

- [ ] I have considered how this change impacts other platforms (mobile, browser extension)
- [ ] I have coordinated with other platform teams if this feature needs cross-platform implementation

### Final Checks

- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest `dev` branch
- [ ] I have NOT bumped the package version (versions are auto-bumped on merge)
- [ ] All CI checks are passing
